00009 #import "RMSessionTests.h"
00010 #import "MockProtocol.h"
00011 #import "RMResultDelegateWrapper.h"
00012 #import "WIRemoting.h"

00014 @implementation RMSessionTests

00016 #pragma mark initialization
00017 
00018 - (void) setUp
00019 {
00020   RMResultDelegateWrapper *m = [[RMResultDelegateWrapper alloc] initWithObject:self
00021                                 finished:@selector(finished:)
00022                                   failed:@selector(failed:error:)];
00023   protocol = [[MockProtocol alloc] init];
00024   call = [[RMCall alloc] initWithProtocol:protocol];
00025   session = [[RMSession alloc] initWithAuthenticator:self
00026                                                 call:call
00027                                             delegate:m];
00028   username = @"admin";
00029   password = @"1234";
00030   [m release];
00031 }
00032 
00033 - (void) tearDown
00034 {
00035   [session release];
00036   [call release];
00037   [protocol release];
00038 }
00039 
00040 #pragma mark tests
00041 
00042 - (void) testSessionAuthentication {
00043   [session authenticate];
00044   if (session.authenticated) {
00045     // should be here
00046   }
00047   else {
00048     STFail(@"Unable to authenticate.");
00049   }
00050 }
00051 
00052 - (void)testFailedAuthentication {
00053   username = @"abc";
00054   id<RMResultDelegate> oldDelegate = [session.delegate retain];
00055   RMResultDelegateWrapper *m = [[RMResultDelegateWrapper alloc] initWithObject:self
00056                                 finished:@selector(finished:)
00057                                   failed:@selector(expectFailed:error:)];
00058   session.delegate = m;
00059 
00060   [session authenticate];
00061   if (session.authenticated) {
00062     // shouldn't be here, because the authenticat must failed with
00063     // wrong credentials
00064     STFail(@"Incorrectly authenticated.");
00065   }
00066   else {
00067     // right
00068   }
00069   
00070   username = @"admin";
00071   session.delegate = oldDelegate;
00072   
00073   [oldDelegate release];
00074   [m release];
00075 }
00076 
00077 - (void)testSessionCall
00078 {
00079   RMResultDelegateWrapper *m = [[RMResultDelegateWrapper alloc] initWithObject:self
00080                                 finished:@selector(finished:)
00081                                   failed:@selector(failed:error:)];
00082   [session call:@"json_echo2"
00083       arguments:[NSDictionary
00084                  dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"hello world", @"echo", nil]
00085        delegate:m];
00086   
00087   [m release];
00088 }
00089 
00090 - (void)testNormalCallWithNoAuthenticationInfo
00091 {
00092   RMResultDelegateWrapper *m = [[RMResultDelegateWrapper alloc] initWithObject:self
00093                                 finished:@selector(finished:)
00094                                   failed:@selector(expectFailed:error:)];
00095   [session.call call:@"json_echo2"
00096       arguments:[NSDictionary
00097                  dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"hello world", @"echo", nil]
00098        delegate:m];
00099   
00100   [m release];
00101 }

00105 - (id<RMCallProtocol>) callProtocol
00106 {
00107   return self;
00108 }
00109 
00110 - (void)authenticateWithCall:(RMCall *)call
00111                     delegate:(id<RMResultDelegate>)delegate
00112 {
00113   if ([call call:@"json_auth"
00114        arguments:[NSDictionary
00115                   dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00116                   username, @"username",
00117                   password, @"password",
00118                   nil]
00119         delegate:delegate]) {
00120     // should be here
00121   }
00122   else {
00123     STFail(@"The authenticate call is not executed.");
00124   }
00125 }
00126 
00127 - (void)adjustRequest:(ASIFormDataRequest *)request
00128                method:(NSString *)method
00129             arguments:(NSDictionary *)arguments
00130 {
00131   [request setPostValue:username forKey:@"username"];
00132   [request setPostValue:password forKey:@"password"];
00133 }
00134 
00135 - (BOOL)authenticateResponseString:(NSString *)responseString
00136 {
00137   // check if it is authentication message
00138   id r = [responseString JSONValue];
00139   if ([r isKindOfClass:[NSDictionary class]]) {
00140     NSNumber *auth = [r valueForKey:@"authenticated"];
00141     // no auth identity, must be correct
00142     if (nil == auth) {
00143       return YES;
00144     }
00145     
00146     if ([auth boolValue]) {
00147       // authenticated
00148       return YES;
00149     }
00150     
00151     return NO;
00152   }
00153   else {
00154     // wrong response type
00155     return NO;
00156   }
00157 }
00158 
00159 - (void)finished:(RMResponse *)response
00160 {
00161 }
00162 
00163 - (void)expectFailed:(RMResponse*) response error:(NSError*) error
00164 {
00165   if ([[error domain] isEqual:NSURLErrorDomain] &&
00166       [error code] == EINVAL) {
00167     // should be here
00168   }
00169   else {
00170     STFail(@"incorrect failure.");
00171   }
00172 }
00173 
00174 - (void)failed:(RMResponse *)response error:(NSError *)error
00175 {
00176   STFail(@"Failed request.");
00177 }
